Original pattern of Float 1: 10000100 00010100000000000000000 
Original pattern of Float 2: 01111111 01000000000000000000000 
Post shift pattern of mant. 1:100010100000000000000000 
Post shift patter on mant. 2: 000001010000000000000000 
Result of adding mantissa: 00011110000000000000000 
Final exponent: 00000101 
Final Result: 00000010100011110000000000000000
